Alteration 9

Army of Rats
Combat
N7
spell id [id]: 710
effect number [effect_number]: 11
damage [damage]: 4297064448
spec [spec]: 8671232
casting time [casttime]: 250%
area of effect [aoe_s]: 100% of battlefield
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 500-
gems required [gemcost]: 5N
Cause Affliction: Cause Battle Fright, Diminuition
Will not be cast against small numbers of enemies:1
 
(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Affects Enemies Only [friendlyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The entire enemy army takes on the aspect of the rat and becomes small and nervous for the rest of their lives. Those affected have their size, strength, hit points and morale reduced. As a side effect defence is increased.
Size -1, HP -30%, Str -3, Def +1, Morale -5, Map move -2.
